efficiency.caption: Floor-to-ceiling windows with acoustically optimized glass allow vast views, while bringing natural light, airiness, and focus into every office.
A highly optimized HVAC system minimizes noise while distributing filtered air with temperature consistency throughout.
Office Floor Plates feature 42' column free core-to-glass spans, with typical high-rise floor plates at 32,000SF and podium floor plates at 64,000SF.
